page.title: 18In the Anstruther News
page.content:
Mr Michael Welch, our school violin teacher has published a book about the history of the Anstruther Lifeboat from 1865 to 1985 after 18 months' research. It costs Â£2.
A sponsored cycle from Anstruther to St Andrews was held to mark 1985 as International Youth Year. It was organised by Dr Barnardo's and the RSPCC. Eight members of the Youth Club took part and some guest stars from TV were involved. Sgt Berwick had enough energy left to cycle back to Anstruther!
The first Kilrenny and Anstruther Community Council Children's Gala will take place on Wednesday 17th July. There will be side-shows, races, a picnic, majorettes, pony rides, pillow fights and a fancy dress competition.
